faq.question: Best editing software for comedy?
faq.answer: Premiere Pro for precise timing control. DaVinci Resolve free version works great too. Key is learning keyboard shortcuts for fast editing.

faq.question: How to time sound effects?
faq.answer: Place on beat with joke delivery. Too early ruins it, too late misses moment. Practice. Study how successful comedians time theirs.

faq.question: Should comedy videos be short?
faq.answer: Depends on format. Shorts work for quick jokes. Longer for sketch/commentary. Pacing matters more than length. Cut ruthlessly regardless.

faq.question: How to make thumbnails funny?
faq.answer: Exaggerated expressions, absurd situations, clear visual joke. The thumbnail should make people curious about the punchline.
